Package it.polimi.tiw.project.utils

Class SimpleResponse

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.tiw.project.utils.SimpleResponse
public class SimpleResponse
extends java.lang.Object
The SimpleResponse contains information about the status of the server response and the message to return to the client
